name: Age of Ultaimia Demo Version
description:
Three paths and three different connected character stories. Classic JRPG gameplay and combat. Find companions and help them discover their memory. The battle against fate begins.

  • Preface:

A twin god and goddess named Obris and Atrix go to war, each creating their species in the process: the dragons and the wolves. A thousand years later, Obris returns with one objective: to save Ultaimia from its destruction. Atrix responds by creating her children, the Chosen Three, in which you take the form of each of them to prevent Ultaimia from being succumbed to fate.

  • Three Connected Stories:
    • Terris, a silver-haired wolf, journeys through the frozen wasteland of the Empire of Atrix on a quest to find the Crystal of Life with the help of his companion Devin who seeks to not only escape the walls of the Empire of Atrix but also to find out the truth of his past.
    • As Rosanna,  her arrival in the Kingdom of Obris was prophesized by a mysterious purple-clothed mage, leading her to go on a quest with unexpected outcomes.
    • As Eric, his appearance in the world is unprecedented, and following the Queen of Obris' orders, he is confronted with an unexpected mission to find his newly found friend.
  • Game Features:
    • Three intertwining stories.
    • Classic JRPG gameplay and combat.
    • Original soundtrack by JaderGamerStudios.
    • Guild System allows players to customize their party member's skills and stats to how they want them to be.
    • The Demo version includes 2-3 hours of content.
    • Befriend and talk to your companions through a friendship system.
    • Detailed lore throughout the world.
    • Demo save data can be transferred to the full game when it releases.
